name: ekai-gateway
description: Ekai Gateway - Multi-provider AI request routing with dashboard

scripts.postinstall: cd gateway && npm install && cd ../ui/dashboard && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:gateway && npm run build:ui
scripts.clean: npm run clean:gateway && npm run clean:ui && rm -rf node_modules gateway/node_modules ui/dashboard/node_modules
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd gateway && npm install && cd ../ui/dashboard && npm install

author: Ekai Labs
